# scale-grid

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                   | Type     | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `columns`  | `columns`   | (optional) Set amount of columns in container | `string` | `undefined` |
| `gutterX`  | `gutter-x`  | (optioanl) Set gutter between rows            | `string` | `undefined` |
| `gutterY`  | `gutter-y`  | (optional) Set gutter between columns         | `string` | `undefined` |
| `maxWidth` | `max-width` | (optioanl) Set max-width to contaier          | `string` | `undefined` |
| `spacing`  | `spacing`   | (optioanl) Set padding to container           | `string` | `undefined` |
